template.template_name: Regulatory Applicability and Configuration Complexity Assessment
template.description: Assessment to determine regulatory applicability and configuration complexity with weighted Yes/No responses.

rows.question: Is this system used to support communication or the transfer of data to a regulatory body?
Does the system create, hold or manage employee training records related to regulated activities?
Is the system used to format and prepare regulatory submissions or to transmit regulatory data?
Is the system used for viewing or creating reports that include regulated data?
Is the system used in support of a regulated business process but does not generate or modify records that are required to be maintained under regulations?
Does the user have the ability to configure access levels?
Does the user have the ability to configure workflows by scripting (e.g., automated actions)?
Does the user have the ability to configure workflows using non-scripting methods?
Does the user have the ability to configure audit trail parameters or ERES?
Does the user have the ability to create calculations or data analytics that are GxP process impacting or would impact regulatory reporting?
Does the user have the ability to create non-GxP related calculations in the system?
Does the user have the ability to configure non-GxP related functions or workflows in the system?

criteria.description: System is not complex and has limited regulatory impact.
System has moderate configuration complexity and potential regulatory relevance.
